attributes.action: The olympic torch procesion through london was a complete farce and a travesty.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To see gordon brown receive the torch in downing street, but to be oh so careful not to touch it or be tainted by it displays his hypocracy and was pathetic. It was not reprentative of the moral standard of this country. I call upon and petition the prime minister and the british people to:- 1 Do not buy any product or service of a company that sponsors the Bejing olympics, 2 Try not to but any product Made in China.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
